name: ChatGPT Enterprise
summary_and_recommendation: APPROVE for general enterprise use. ChatGPT Enterprise provides robust security controls, guaranteed no-training data usage, comprehensive admin controls, and enterprise-grade compliance. Recommended for most business use cases with standard enterprise data.
data_classification: Suitable for Internal Business Data and Customer Data
assessment_notes: High confidence based on comprehensive public documentation and enterprise security specifications. Limited access to detailed enterprise-specific security documentation.

required_permissions: No specific Azure permissions - web-based service
recommended_restrictions: Configure domain verification for organizational control
Enable audit logging for compliance monitoring

recommendations.title: Implement Full Enterprise Configuration
recommendations.description: Configure admin console with domain verification, SSO, and audit logging to maximize security controls.

recommendations.title: Establish Data Retention Policies
recommendations.description: Configure appropriate data retention periods through admin controls based on business requirements.

recommendations.title: User Training and Guidelines
recommendations.description: Provide training on appropriate enterprise use cases and data handling guidelines.

sources.title: Business Data Privacy, Security, and Compliance

detailed_assessment.summary_and_recommendation: APPROVE for general enterprise use. ChatGPT Enterprise provides robust security controls, guaranteed no-training data usage, comprehensive admin controls, and enterprise-grade compliance. Recommended for most business use cases with standard enterprise data.

geographic_control.justification: Known secure regions (US, EU) with contracts - OpenAI operates enterprise services with documented data residency controls and contractual guarantees for enterprise customers, though specific geographic control options for free tier are limited.

encryption_standards.justification: Enterprise-Grade Encryption - AES-256 encryption at rest and in transit + vendor-managed keys + published encryption specifications - OpenAI documentation confirms 'Data encryption at rest (AES-256) and in transit between our customers and us, and between us and our service providers (TLS 1.2+)' with detailed encryption specifications publicly available.

data_retention.justification: Customer-Controlled Retention - No data retention OR customer controls all retention periods OR immediate deletion available on demand - ChatGPT Enterprise provides admin-controlled retention policies where 'Your workspace admins control how long your data is retained' with deleted conversations removed from systems within 30 days.

model_training.justification: Contractual guarantee of no training use - ChatGPT Enterprise provides explicit contractual guarantees that 'No conversations with GPTs are used to improve or train the OpenAI models' and enterprise customer data is never used for training purposes.

data_sharing.justification: No third-party sharing - OpenAI's enterprise privacy policy establishes that customer data remains confidential and is not shared with third parties for enterprise accounts.

admin_management.justification: Full Enterprise Controls - Centralized admin dashboard + user provisioning/deprovisioning + role-based permissions + group management + domain verification - ChatGPT Enterprise provides comprehensive admin console with domain verification, user management, and role-based access controls.

audit_capabilities.justification: Good Auditing - Activity logs available + basic reporting + some user tracking capabilities - Enterprise version provides audit logging capabilities and usage insights through the admin console, though detailed real-time comprehensive auditing features are not fully detailed in public documentation.

integration.justification: Full Enterprise Integration - SAML/OIDC SSO + SCIM provisioning + Active Directory integration + API access for enterprise management - ChatGPT Enterprise supports SSO, domain verification, and enterprise integrations with comprehensive API access for management.

regulatory_violations.justification: Fully Compliant - Published compliance certifications (SOC 2, ISO 27001, etc.) + signed BAAs available + documented GDPR Article 28 compliance + industry-specific certifications - OpenAI maintains SOC 2 Type 2 compliance, provides Business Associate Agreements for HIPAA compliance, and has documented GDPR compliance measures.

data_processing_transparency.justification: Full Transparency - Published data flow diagrams + specific data processing locations + detailed retention schedules + clear third-party processor list - OpenAI provides comprehensive transparency documentation for enterprise customers including data processing locations, retention schedules, and third-party relationships.

documentation_and_support.justification: No Transparency - While OpenAI provides extensive public documentation about ChatGPT Enterprise security features, detailed enterprise-specific security documentation, support responsiveness metrics, and comprehensive transparency reports are not publicly available, requiring direct vendor engagement for full transparency.
